NPC.name: commander Frei
NPC.description: A tall and uncompromising bunny girl, even if you discount her stark white bunny ears she caps 6 feet tall easily. She's clad in a form fitting blue uniform jumpsuit that serves nicely to emphasize her bust, a gold shield on her chest as a badge. She watches you calculatingly, clearly she's not someone you'd want to try and fool. Judging by the equipment at her belt she has ways of dealing with those who try.
